description: Housed inside the Milano Verticale | UNA Esperienze hotel in the Corso Como district of the city, this new restaurant is run by Enrico Bartolini, the chef with the most Michelin stars to his name in Italy. Elegance, comfort and design are the key words to describe the stylish decor here, while the cuisine showcases the best of Milanese traditions. The focus here is on seasonality not just in the fruit and vegetables, but also the fish and some of the meat dishes.
